name: Autosaver for Contact Form 7
author: Bishoy A.

sections.description:
This is a simple add-on plugin for the Contact form 7 plugin that allows you to do 2 things:

  1. Select some forms to enable auto-save on them, meaning when a user fill the form, without even submitting it, then navigates to another page and comes back or refreshes the page, they will see the data they previously filled still available for them!
  2. Select some forms to enable “Fill with Facebook” feature for them, this will automatically insert a link to the contact form 7 selected that when a user clicks, it allows them to authenticate their Facebook profile and automatically fill the form fields once they authenticate!

The plugin comes with a nice WordPress admin’s dashboard settings page and is very easy to use!

This plugin is not affiliated with the Contact Form 7 plugin
sections.installation:
1. Go to your admin area and select Plugins -> Add new from the menu.
  2. Search for “Contact Form 7 Autosaver”.
  3. Click install.
  4. Click activate.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added feature to exclude form fields using the class ‘ascf7-excluded’.
  • WordPress Version compatibility.
  • Updating Facebook SDK.
  • Fixing issues with settings page not working.

1.0

  • Initial Release.

short_description: Auto-save selected Contact Form 7 and Auto-fill them by Facebook!
